newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Brussels bourse has bumper pre-Christmas Friday.
newsitem.headline: Brussels bourse has bumper pre-Christmas Friday.

text.p: 1535 GMT - Brussels leading shares closed higher on Friday with a bullish 6.9 billion francs volume of Belgian shares traded due to the expiry of options, futures and spurred on by the Dow's .DJI extended gains.
* Company news aided stocks such as UCB which gained 0.81 percent to 81,250 francs and Fortis AG up 2.37 percent to 4,965 francs.
* Steel cord and wire maker Bekaert regained some of the ground it lost earlier this week due to a 1996 profit warnings to rise 5.12 percent to 19,500 francs.
